info.title: 09.11.23 Webinar API Examples - Practical case
info.description: API implementation examples for 2nd part of IIBA Belarus Chapter webinar 'Requirements & API'

post.summary: Create a new Employee with minimal attributes
post.description:
**Experience API** for HR app allowing to add a new [Employee](https://www.merriam-webster.com/dictionary/employee) in a simplified way. Create a new Employee record associated with a specific Employer. Employee uniqueness is checked by a combination of firstName, lastName, dateOfBirth, taxId.
 
          System API: POST /v1/employees
